item.title: Vanessa add a quote by Kristin Cashore
item.description: "How absurd it was that in all seven kingdoms, the weakest and most vulnerable of people - girls, women - went unarmed and were taught nothing of fighting, while the strong were trained to the highest reaches of their skill." -- Kristin Cashore

item.title: Vanessa add a quote by Kristin Cashore
item.description: "I'm not going to wear a red dress," she said. "It would look stunning, My Lady," she called. She spoke to the bubbles gathered on the surface of the water. "If there's anyone I wish to stun at dinner, I'll hit him in the face." -- Kristin Cashore

item.title: Vanessa add a quote by Becca Fitzpatrick
Vanessa add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "Fall down again, Bella?' No, Emmett, I punched a werewolf in the face." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Vanessa add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "Look after my heart - I've left it with you." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Vanessa add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "You nicked-named my daughter after the Lock Ness Monster!" -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Vanessa add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "Why am I covered in feathers" -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Vanessa add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "Now you know," I said lightly, and shrugged. "No one's ever loved anyone as much as I love you." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Vanessa add a quote by stephenie meyer
item.description: "My life was an unending, unchanging midnight. It must, by necessity, always be midnight for me. So how was it possible that the sun was rising now, in the middle of my midnight?" -- stephenie meyer

item.title: Vanessa add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "Did you seriously just stamp your foot? I thought girls only did that on TV." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Vanessa add a quote by Maggie Stiefvater
item.description: "So, Grace, how's school?" I asked myself. Dad nodded, eyes on the baby koala now struggling in the guest's arms. "Oh, it's fine," I continued, and Dad made a mumbling noise of agreement. I added, "Nothing special, aside from the load of pandas they brought in, and the teachers abandoning us to cannibalistic savages-" I paused to see if I'd caught his attention yet, then pressed on. "The whole building caught fire, then I failed drama, and then sex, sex, sex." Dad's eyes abruptly focused, and he turned to me and frowned. "What did you say they were teaching you in school?" -- Maggie Stiefvater

item.title: Vanessa add a quote by Maggie Stiefvater
Vanessa add a quote by Maggie Stiefvater
item.description: "Grace,” I said, very softly. “Say something.” Sam,” she said, and I crushed her to me." -- Maggie Stiefvater

item.title: Vanessa add a quote by Maggie Stiefvater
Vanessa add a quote by Maggie Stiefvater
item.description: "Sam: “You—you greatly overestimate my self-control.” Grace: “I’m not looking for self-control." -- Maggie Stiefvater

item.title: Vanessa add a quote by Maggie Stiefvater
item.description: "right in this moment, I can´t even remember what unhappy feels like." -- Maggie Stiefvater

item.title: Vanessa add a quote by Maggie Stiefvater
item.description: "What are you wishing for?' Grace interrupted. 'To kiss you,' I said to her." -- Maggie Stiefvater

item.title: Vanessa add a quote by Maggie Stiefvater
item.description: "Here is another secret: I have no business being fascinated by you." -- Maggie Stiefvater

item.title: Vanessa add a quote by Gail Carson Levine
item.description: "It is helpful to know the proper way to behave, so one can decide whether or not to be proper." -- Gail Carson Levine
